original_text: For thou hast had five husbands; and he whom thou now hast is not thy husband: in that saidst thou truly.
korean_text: 너에게 남편 다섯이 있었고 지금 있는 자도 네 남편이 아니니 네 말이 참되도다

sentences.original_text: For thou hast had five husbands
and he whom thou now hast
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 지금 가진 그 사람은
